the game is fun, it has a large learning curve. The hit detection needs to be fixed you usually get hit from miles away if the killer has worse internet than you. Pick it up when its cheap otherwise you will feel bad when you realize you just wasted 20 dollars on a game thats been out for 7 years but is still broken.

Love this game! I played on Console for the longest and decided to play on PC. Only thing is the lag is the worst even with a great ping number, so you have to turn down all your settings for it to play without a lag. Other than that, love it!

가볍게 시작할 게임은 절대아님 내가 생존자를 하면 20랭크부터 보라랭크까진 발전기 3개이상 돌려야 하는게임 수두룩하고 일단 팀원이 강종을 ㅈㄴ함 그냥 자살하는 애들도 허다하고  앉는키를 게임내내 누르는애들도 진짜많음 그렇다면 빨랭은 정상이냐? 그것도아님 게임구조상 클로킹만 오지게하고 발전기 몇개돌리고 구출좀 하면 오를수밖에 없어서 그냥 어반이라는 기술(앉으면 빨라짐)끼고 다니는애들 심심치않게 봄 그래도 왜 이 게임을 하냐? 살인마와 1대1구도가 나왔을때 내 실력을 판가름이 가능함 다른게임과 다르게 킬러가 사람이다보니 발전기 팅팅팅 켜져도 안잡히는 내모습을 보고 판자로 살인마 머가리를 때리고 불리한 상황에서 개구탈출하는 그런 짜릿한 맛이 일품임 힘든만큼 정신보상은 좋은게임 아 그리고 살인마는 앵간하면 하지마세요 진짜 별 또라이가 많아서 티베깅에 4칼찌시계불굴손전등or즉시힐(걍 대처못하는, 롤로따지면 프로팀 만난거) 다인큐 만나면 멘탈이 갈갈히 찢깁니다 그래도 감수하고 하고싶다면 무운을 빕니다

Truly the Holy Grail of awful developers.

Do you like horrible balance? Check! 
Do you like gamebreaking bugs that aren't patched for months? Check!
Do you like egregious microtransactions, including ones that affect gameplay? Check!
Do you like insane amounts of grind that rivals a free mobile game? Check!
Do you like devs deleting criticism on the forums? Check!
Do you like a toxic community with no oversight or bans? Check!
Do you like horrible optimization? Double check!



Really, there is a good game here, but the devs push out dozens and dozens of expensive skins, while actual bug fixes and balance changes take place, at most, two to four times per year, and the changes made are minor to the point of comical. They will nerf bad perks and buff the best ones, or "rework" overpowered perks that cost real money by slightly lowering numbers so that it does basically nothing. The meta hasn't shifted in literally years, because the game is balanced around a small handful of perks that exist to band-aid core design problems. Any new perks added are extremely weak, and only exist to pad out the RNG level up system.


Go to the forums, and you will find the devs lying through their teeth on a regular basis. Balance changes promised a year or more ago never materialized, and every statement made is the same boiler plate "We are looking into it". They are not looking into anything, and never do. This game should be in Early Access for the state that it's in, but it's not. 



The game is essentially built around psychological manipulation and keeping numbers going up. The game holds perks over your head with a grindy level up system, while giving ads for skins every time you start up. It's genuinely disgusting. It's literally worse than any EA game I've ever played.



I will NEVER buy from this company, and I am telling you not to. You will be irritated and you will regret your purchase. They are horrible, awful devs that treat their community like less than dirt, and do the absolute bare minimum to keep people playing their Skinner Box.
Lo unico que queria decir es que worran juega solo, asi que debe ser un buen juego.

Oyunun hikayesi gayet güzel ve oynanabilirlik açısından eğlenceli.Oyundaki katiller oyuna extra gerilim ve heycan katıyor.Bunun dışında bir çok farklı harita olmasıda gayet güzel.BUNUN DIŞINDA OYUNDA BAZI OROSPU ÇOCUKLARI VAR ÖRNEĞİN KANCAYA ASTIKTAN SONRA BAŞINIZDA BEKLEYİP OYUN ZEVKİNİZİ PİÇ EDEBİLİYORLAR.BUNUN İBNELER VARSA BU YAZIYI OKUYAN ONA GÖTTEN GİREYİM.

Venis cansado del laburo a jugar con tus amigos para que te salga una cazadora bajandoté de un hachazo con mori de ébano que encima te tunelea y hardcampea así no sacas ni 15 bp en toda la partida, salis al lobby esperanzado de putearla y ves que es de consola así que no te lee por lo que procedes a hacer lo mismo que el, te clavas 4 dias leveleando a la cazadora para sacarle todos los perks y en la primera partida que te mandas te salen 4 pibes rank 1 haciendo lan party con 1 llave 2 linternas y una caja de herramientas para sabotearte hasta el último gancho de la partida y que terminés rompiendo el 144hz que sacaste a pagar en cuotas (y vas por la 2da de 36) de un cabezazo, mientras tus viejos te gritan que cerrés el orto y piensan severamente en internarte, El jueguito.

Na mentira, tiene un par de bugs pero es divertido con amigos,no sean tóxicos e ignoren a los tóxicos y la van a pasar piola. Recomendado pa.

At first when the game came out it was actuly great, when the killers werent to op like they are now, there was more palets and stuf like that, now the killers are to opp, match cooldown if you leave???, alotss of bugss and glitchess, the game is not worth the money with such bugs... not recommending at all!!

まず初めに断っておくと、このゲームがどのようなゲーム性なのかは散々他の方のレビューに記されているのでここでは紹介しない。このレビューには4000時間をこのゲームに費やした僕の所感をメリットとデメリットに分けてそれぞれ簡単に残そうと思う。

このゲームをこれまでやってきて感じたデメリットを敢えて先に挙げることにする。
細かいことをいちいち挙げていたらキリがないし、それに関しては他の皆が代弁してくれている。「DbD 不満」と検索するまでもない。「DbD」と検索するだけで無限に不平不満が溢れているのが見て取れる。バグ、運営、民度などについていろいろと言われてはいるが、正直なところ僕はそこまでそれらにストレスを感じていない。むしろそれらを楽しむくらいの楽観性を運良く持ち合わせているからだと思う。ただ冷静に考えてみると、このゲームに費やした4000時間を仮に司法試験の勉強に当てたとしたら今頃僕は弁護士である。もしそれが現実だったら今頃、法廷で「異議あり！！」なんて指差したり、合コンで「休日は趣味である六法全書をコーヒー片手に読むことです」なんて抜かしたりしてるのだろう(知らんけど)。一方で、現実世界ではどうだろう。喘鳴凛にやられて「んだこのブルーベリーガイジは！！！」と親でも殺されたような顔で台パンする日々である。とても愚かしい。この差はなんだろう。4000時間を司法試験の勉強したかこのゲームをしたか、である。
したがってこのゲームを他人にオススメするかと言われれば、可愛い女の子にモテて、毎日舐めくりまわしたいと思う人にはオススメしない。司法試験受けようぜ！
ん？このゲームやるメリット？んなもんねえよ。
This game is the best game ive ever played in my life and i highly recommend this game to all gamers and even  my liitle brother likes it and if you buy this game its worth it.

This game is not made for everyone. I have 8 months of experience on my old xbox and this game gets worse on pc. It is quite fun and addicting but the player  base is quite toxic. It is also quite buggy but overall I would give it a solid 8.5/10. I recommend purchasing it :)
Веселая игрушка. Весело пофаниться вешая игрушки, или просто зависнуть на время... Игра сажает на крючок. ;-)
